mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_id AS userId, u.coupon_id AS couponId, u.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, u.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, u.gmt_end AS gmtEnd, c.title, c.category_id AS categoryId, c.`min`, c.discount FROM b2c_coupon_user AS u, b2c_coupon AS c WHERE u.coupon_id = c.id AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.gmt_used IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_start) < unix_timestamp(now()) AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_end) > unix_timestamp(now())

SELECT u.id, u.user_id AS userId, u.coupon_id AS couponId, u.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, u.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, c.title, c.category_id AS categoryId, c.`min`, c.discount FROM b2c_coupon_user AS u, b2c_coupon AS c WHERE u.id = #{userCouponId} AND u.coupon_id = c.id AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.gmt_used IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_start) < unix_timestamp(now()) AND unix_timestamp(u.gmt_end) > unix_timestamp(now())
